mapper.select: SELECT rno, gno, id, body, wdate, avatar FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, gno, id, body, wdate, avatar FROM ( SELECT gno, id, body, wdate, savename avatar FROM member m, guestboard g, avatar a WHERE g.isshow = 'Y' AND mno = writer AND avt = ano ORDER BY wdate DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM guestboard g WHERE g.isshow = 'Y' AND writer = (SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id})
SELECT mno, savename avatar FROM member m, avatar a WHERE avt = ano AND id = #{id}
